jd:
Hi, This is Harshini from Yochana IT Solutions, I Recently found your resume in one of our Job portal and We are looking for “Sr. Scrum Master at Newark, NJ (Onsite)” with one of our client, I have included the job information below, If you are interested, please share your updated resume.

Sr. Scrum Master
Newark, NJ (Onsite)
12 months+

Minimum Mandatory Skills:
- Scrum Alliance CSM
- CSP certification
- PMI’s Agile Certified Professional (ACP)
- Knowledge and experience with Agile techniques – Automated Testing, Agile Central, User Stories, TDD, Continuous Integration, Testing, Pairing, Agile Games, etc.

Responsibilities:
- 10+ Years of IT Experience
- 5+ Years of Scrum Master Experience
- 5+ Years of Project Management Experience in IT/Finance Services

Thanks & Regards
Harshini Gadam
Yochana IT Solutions Inc
23000 Commerce Drive, Farmington Hills, MI 48335
Email id harshini@yochana.com
